name: Yimiao Sun (孙一淼)
description:
I'm a Ph.D. student at Tsinghua University, and now a member of [The System and Ubiquitous Networking Group (SUN)](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/) led by [Prof. Yuan He](http://www.greenorbs.org/people/heyuan).
My current research interests include Wireless Sensing and RF Computing.
Contact Me: sym21@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn;   sun_yimiao@foxmail.com
